name: GIVE ME BACK MY LEGS!
description:
A short, frustrating platformer where you can't walk. Inspired by Quake and Getting over it with Bennett Foddy.

In this game, in order to advance, you have to use Quake-like rocket jumps. The physics are your enemy! Your player bounces for a while when landing, and this makes the game very difficult.

You can also collect optional coins, which do nothing. They're here just for your satisfaction.

Controls
  • X - Choose/Fire
  • Arrow keys - Select/Aim
  • R - Restart level
